component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
proxy false java.lang.Boolean false Uses a proxy element for dragging.
dragOnly false java.lang.Boolean false Disabled dropping, just for movement.
for false java.lang.String Id of the component to add draggable behavior
disabled false java.lang.Boolean false Disables or enables dragging
axis false java.lang.String Specifies drag axis, possible values are x and y
containment false java.lang.String Constrains dragging within the boundaries of containment element
helper false java.lang.String Helper element to display when dragging
revert false java.lang.Boolean false Reverts draggable to it's original position when not dropped onto a droppable
snap false java.lang.Boolean false Draggable will snap to edge of the near elements
snapMode false java.lang.String Draggable will snap to edge of the near elements
snapTolerance false java.lang.Integer 20 Distance from the snap element in pixels to trigger snap
zindex false java.lang.Integer -1 zindex to apply during dragging
handle false java.lang.String Specifies a handle for draggable
opacity false java.lang.Double 1.0 Defines the opacity of helper
stack false java.lang.String In stack mode, draggables overlap is controlled automatically, dragged item always overlays other draggables.
grid false java.lang.String Dragging happens in every x and y pixels in a grid.
scope false java.lang.String Scope key to match draggables and droppables.
cursor false java.lang.String crosshair CSS cursor during dragging.
dashboard false java.lang.String Id of the dashboard to connect draggable to.
